meanings.definition: A person or thing that interferes.
meanings.sent1: The interferer kept interrupting our conversation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned the interferer to stop disrupting the class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous interferer thought it was funny to mess with the TV remote.
meanings.sent4: His loud music acted as an interferer to my concentration.
meanings.sent5: The interference caused by the interferer made it hard to hear the speaker.

meanings.definition: One who meddles in the affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: The interferer always poked their nose into everyone's business.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the neighborhood interferer due to her gossiping.
meanings.sent3: The interferer tried to help but ended up causing more trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her meddling made her the interferer in every situation.
meanings.sent5: The interferer's nosiness was unmatched in the small town.

meanings.definition: A device that disrupts or obstructs a signal.
meanings.sent1: The old microwave was an interferer with the Wi-Fi connection.
meanings.sent2: The interferer in the radio caused static during the broadcast.
meanings.sent3: The interferer gadget malfunctioned and scrambled the TV channels.
meanings.sent4: The interference from the interferer device made the phone call unclear.
meanings.sent5: The signal was lost due to the interferer blocking the transmission.
